articles.title: Kopf des Tages
articles.image_title: Battle of Baker's Creek, Mississippi, American Civil War, 16 May 1863. Defeat of the Confederate troops under Lieutenant-General John C Pemberton by Indiana troops under General McGinnis. Also known as the Battle of Champion Hill, Baker's Creek was the decisive engagement in Union General Ulysses S Grant's Vicksburg campaign. (The Print Collector / Heritage Images)
articles.author: Berthold Seewald
